subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Tommy Robredo beat Nicolas Mahut of France, 7-5, 4-6, 6-4, in the semifinals of the Moselle Open in Metz, France. Robredo will face third-seeded Andy Murray in today’s final. Murray defeated second-seeded Guillermo Cañas, 7-6 (2), 6-4.
snippet: Top-seeded Tommy Robredo beat Nicolas Mahut of France, 7-5, 4-6, 6-4, in the semifinals of the Moselle Open in Metz, France. Robredo will face third-seeded Andy Murray in today’s final. Murray defeated second-seeded Guillermo Cañas, 7-6 (2), 6-4.
